title: How to Clean Resin from a Glass Pipe

steps.headline: Get your pipe that you want to clean.
Get your container that you are going to put the pipe into and put an inch or two of the alcohol.
Add 2 to 3 tablespoons (29.6 to 44.4 ml) of the salt.
steps.description: The reason the salt is useful because it takes a lot longer to dissolve in the alcohol.

steps.headline: Put the pipe into the container and shake it.
steps.description: This is why it needs to be plastic with a leakproof lid.

steps.headline: After a few minutes, take it out and use any of the recommended tools that you might have.
Go back to shaking it.
steps.description: If you would like, let it sit there for a while.

steps.headline: Take it out of the container and rinse thoroughly.

tyn: Large grained salt, like kosher salt
Plastic container with lid (leak proof is a good idea)
